author: Special Correspondent
text:
A two-day medical exhibition organised by the Western Ghats International School in association with Coimbatore Medical College began on Friday.

The exhibition was a part of the golden jubilee celebration of Coimbatore Medical College and a part of Kovai Vizha, celebrating the spirit of Coimbatore city. The Hindu is the media partner.

Professors and students of Coimbatore Medical College explained the functioning of organs to the visitors.

School Correspondent Hemalatha Sashikumar took part. The exhibition was inaugurated by Dr. Aishwarya Arjun, Chairperson of Health, Young Indians of Confederation of Indian Industries, in the presence of the Dean, CMC, Dr. Edwin Joe.

Thousands of school and college students visited the exhibition. Free tests were conducted for the visitors.
title: Medical exhibition begins
